categories: Category:Cite web date argument usages with incorrect date formats

nodes.text: The Solo: A Star Wars Story soundtrack is the score for the film Solo: A Star Wars Story, composed by John Powell. It was released on May 25, 2018, the same day as the film itself. A Deluxe Edition was released on November 20, 2020, featuring a longer soundtrack.

Along with the soundtrack for Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, the soundtrack was nominated for Grammy awards in the categories of Best Instrumental Composition and Score Soundtrack For Visual Media.
All tracks composed and conducted by John Powell unless otherwise stated.
